alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 1:18PM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible. * WHERE...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands, heaviest west of Beaver along Dalton Highway Summits. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will begin Tuesday evening and continue into Thursday evening. The heaviest snowfall is expected in the higher terrain south and west of Beaver along the Dalton Highway Summits.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
